channel.title: Jupyter on Yuvi Panda
channel.description: Recent content in Jupyter on Yuvi Panda

item.title: The Littlest Jupyterhub
item.description: This idea comes from brainstorming along with Lindsey Heagy, Carol Willing, Tim Head & Nick Bollweg at the Jupyter Team Meeting 2018. Most of the good ideas are theirs! The name is inspired by one of favorite TV series of one of my favorite people. I really love the idea of JupyterHub distributions - opinionated combination of components that target a specific use case. The Zero to JupyterHub distribution is awesome & works for most people.
